short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension give your api name of any field you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension saves your few clicks to get api name of any field. You can just choose your object name and get all the field with their api names. Search is also available in case of Large number of fields
